content: Asian supermarket chain **Market Place** (formerly **Market Place by Jasons**, **Jason's Food & Living**, and **Jasons ichiba**) in [Hong Kong](/wiki/Hong_Kong) is a high-end [supermarket](/wiki/Supermarket) [chain](/wiki/Chain_store) owned by [DFI Retail Group](/wiki/DFI_Retail_Group). The chain also has a joint venture in mainland China with [Beijing Hualian Group](/wiki/Beijing_Hualian_Group) called **BHG Market Place** and formerly ran stores (**Jasons Market Place**) in [Taiwan](/wiki/Taiwan) until they were sold to [Carrefour](/wiki/Carrefour). The Malaysian chain called **Mercat√≥** (formerly **Jasons Food Hall**) is owned by Macrovalue Sdn Bhd. after its acquisition of DFI Malaysian food retailing business in 2023. **Cold Storage Fresh** (formerly **Market Place**, **Jasons**, and **Jasons Deli**) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) is also owned by Macrovalue Sdn Bhd since 2025. **The Marketplace** (formerly **Market Place by Rustan's**) in the [Philippines](/wiki/Philippines) is owned by [Robinsons Retail Holdings](/wiki/Robinsons_Retail). DFI also operates further similar supermarkets under the [3hreeSixty](/wiki/3hreeSixty) and Oliver's The Delicatessen brands in Hong Kong and other supermarkets around [Asia](/wiki/Asia) with [Wellcome](/wiki/Wellcome). ## History Jasons Market Place started its business in Singapore in 1975. It was introduced in Taiwan in 2003. In 2007, it opened in Hong Kong's [Jardine's Lookout](/wiki/Jardine%27s_Lookout) under the name "Market Place by Jasons". In 2012, Jasons Food Hall began operations in the Bangsar Shopping Centre, an upmarket shopping mall in the township of [Bangsar](/wiki/Bangsar), Malaysia, as a replacement for a [Cold Storage](/wiki/Cold_Storage_(supermarket)) store. Jasons Market Place in Taiwan was sold to [Carrefour](/wiki/Carrefour) in 2020 and rebranded as Mia C'bon from 2022. ## Brands ### Private labels Market Place supermarkets sell products from DFI's Meadows and Yu Pin King private labels.[*citation needed*] - [Dairy Farm International Holdings](/wiki/Dairy_Farm_International_Holdings) - [Cold Storage](/wiki/Cold_Storage_(supermarket)) - [Wellcome](/wiki/Wellcome) Portals: - Supermarkets - Companies - Market Place (Hong Kong) - Cold Storage Fresh (Singapore) - Jasons Market Place (Taiwan)
